scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev input=index.js file=windLayer rollup -wm -c build/rollup-dev-config.js
scripts.dev:ol: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev input=openlayers/index.js file=OlWind rollup -wm -c build/rollup-dev-config.js
scripts.dev:bmap: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev input=bmap/index.js file=BMapWind rollup -wm -c build/rollup-dev-config.js
scripts.dev:amap: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev input=amap/index.js file=AMapWind rollup -wm -c build/rollup-dev-config.js
scripts.build:ol: cross-env NODE_ENV=pro input=openlayers/index.js file=OlWind rollup -m -c build/rollup-dev-config.js
scripts.build:amap: cross-env NODE_ENV=pro input=amap/index.js file=AMapWind rollup -m -c build/rollup-dev-config.js
scripts.build:bmap: cross-env NODE_ENV=pro input=bmap/index.js file=BMapWind rollup -m -c build/rollup-dev-config.js
scripts.build: npm run build:ol && npm run build:bmap && npm run build:amap && cross-env NODE_ENV=pro input=index.js file=windLayer node build/rollup-prod-config.js
